name: QuidWriter Document
summary: A QPQD file is a text document created by Scratchware QuidWriter, a simple word processor for Windows that is included with the QuidProQuo productivity suite. It contains text and formatting information, such as bold type, italics, page color, text font , and font sizes, in a format similar to the Rich Text Format ( .RTF ). Scratchware introduced QPQD files in 2024 as the default format for saving documents with QuidWriter, replacing .QUID files.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
